description: Porpoise observations of the LifeWatch Cetacean passive acoustic network from August 2016 to July 2017. Median detection positive hours (DPH; DPH of 1 means at least one porpoise was observed) per day were displayed for each month.
keywords: c-pod, observation, acoustic, harbor porpoise, hydrophone, passive, Species distribution
name: Detection positive hours per day (C-POD, Belgian part of North Sea, 2016-2017)
